channel.title: Ridiculous-PK 718/752 24-7 Dedicated Host 2GB DDos protection
channel.description:
Before we start I am using Foxtrot, Since i released Ridiculous-PK on the moparscape downloads i thought I'd try and work on another server and get it to the standers of rdpk and a bit more.
[center]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jMHj0Bc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GoLKJmQ.jpg[/img]
Www.ridiculous-pk.co.uk --- Home www.ridiculous-pk.co.uk/vote ---Vote www.ridiculous-pk.co.uk/webclient.html - Playnow
Latest Updates:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BEU5E9r.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Mo6GNLu.png[/img]
We have been updating this server stupidly adding loads of new content never seen before and we are going to carry on doing this until we think we are finished.
New 12/02/14 Fixed Mage Orbs Fixed and changed Interface selection Fixed Lamps Interface Changed Char Models to enable Girl modelling Changed Cache so its less buggy.
[size=15pt]Images:[/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xoPG29q.png[/img]
